title: Full Stack Web Developer
content: My name is Cayman Heng. I am a developer with a background in Management Consulting. I help businesses develop human-centered design interfaces that are aligned with their strategy.

title: Create and manage content for your users easily
content: I have experience developing applications for companies to allow their customers to manage data at their fingertips. I have worked on a fitness tracker for users to view, create, and track their daily workouts.

title: Optimize user experience through beauitful web interface
content: I specialize in applying design thinking methodologies to understand user behaviour. I have created websites that offer a frictionless experience and adapt to your audience's device.

title: Build applications that meet your business needs
content: Every business has different needs. I help businesses implement tailor-made solutions to resolve their problems. I have previously developed a burger restaurant app that is connected to a database where customers can input their orders.

title: I help small and medium businesses go digital

content.one: As a Web Developer with a background in Management Consulting, I stand at the interesction of business and technology. I have worked with clients across retail, airlines, and financial services to shape their business strategy.
content.two: I am proficient in utilizing cutting edge technologies e.g. HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, API, and MYSQL to create websites that provide an immersive user experience.
content.three: Book an appointment or email me at hengcayman@gmail.com today for a free consultation.
